name: MeloX
description: MeloX is a music player app for Web. It is a full-stack application that allows users to listen to music. The app is still in development. I am currently working on adding new features and improving the existing ones as well as creating mobile client using React Native.

name: Erasmus Page
description: Simple fullstack web application that I created for signing up for an evaluation event after the Erasmus+ program. The app is signing up users using Mailchimp API.

name: CS effects of learning data analysis and visualization
Tik-Tak-Toe
description: Web page of the classic game of Tic-Tac-Toe. I've built this project to practice my JavaScript skills on summmer holiday.

name: Bussybee
description: Fullstack web application for managing tasks. I've built this project as a final project for the Web Application Development class at 3rd year of my computer science degree. The app is built using MVC architecture.

name: Old Portfolio Website
description: Simple one page portfolio website built as a final project for the Basics of Web Development class at 2nd year of my computer science degree.
